title: Strictly's Dianne Buswell says she still slow dances with boyfriend Joe Sugg at home
text:
Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly star Dianne Buswell has confessed she still slow dances with boyfriend Joe Sugg at home.

The 30-year-old Strictly professional gushed about her romance with the YouTube sensation during an interview with Amanda Holden and Jason King on Heart Radio's Breakfast Show on Monday.

The pair confirmed their relationship after Strictly finished last year and have since moved in together.

Presenter Amanda, 48, teased Dianne about her blossoming relationship with her former Strictly Come Dancing celebrity partner Joe.

She questioned: "Do you still kind of slow dance together at home?"

The fiery redhead replied :"You know what, we actually do.

"Especially on a Saturday night after the show, we come home and I think he misses it so much and he’s like ‘do I still have it?’ and he puts his hands up in to frame and yeah, he loves it."

Dianne made headlines last week as she was rushed to hospital after being dropped during rehearsals by partner and radio DJ Dev Griffin.

Fans were rest assured however, as Dianne and Dev still danced to Friend Like Me by Will Smith from Aladdin on Saturday night and scored a 36 out of 40.

Dianne and Dev impressed the judges with their street dance inspired moves which brought Motsi Mabuse, Shirley Ballas and Bruno Tonioli to their feet with a standing ovation.

Amanda and Jason asked Dianne how she was recovering from the accident, to which the dancer replied: "We danced on Saturday night and I live to tell the tale!"

(Image: BBC)

During her brief hospital stay, Dianne asked fans to send in questions via Instagram with one asking how she knew boyfriend and ex Strictly dance partner Joe was "the one".

She adorably replied: "The list is endless but here are a few things: He makes me laugh every single day, he is so caring not just for me but also others.

"He has the kindest heart, he is the most talented human I know but with all his success is still the most grounded person I have ever met… The list could go on and on."

(Image: BBC)

At the beginning of the radio interview, stand-in presenter JK labelled it "the weirdest start to an interview I've ever experienced."

He told listeners: "Amanda has literally just taken a selfie of Dianne to send to her husband Chris because he fancies her"

Amanda laughed as she replied: "He just says shes got lovely teeth and she is very pretty. That's obviously what he looks for in a woman...it's like she's some kind of horse, he checks out your teeth out first!"

When speaking about the chances of winning on Strictly, Dianne revealed she is aiming high with her partner Dev.

"Lets just take each week as it comes. Right now, we are aiming for Blackpool and if we get there, we will aim even higher."
description: The Strictly professional has been dating the YouTube star since they were partnered together on the BBC show last year
